DSBPayrollFemale.description: Daily sickness benefits salary total for women

DSBPayrollMale.description: Daily sickness benefits salary total for men

DSBPayrollTotal.description: Total daily sickness benefits salary for men and women

premiumPersongroup.description: Premium of the insured group of persons

netPremiumDSBPersongroupMalePercentage.description: Net premium rate for daily sickness benefits for men in the group of persons. The net premium rate corresponds to the percentage of the net premium offered after deducting any discounts (combination discounts, payroll discounts, etc.), but without surcharges for fixed premium components. The net premium includes any final fee, brokerage fee, taxes and duties. Corresponds to the premium charged to the customer.

netPremiumDSBPersongroupMaleAmount.description: Net premium amount for daily sickness benefits for men in the group of persons. The net premium amount corresponds to the amount of the net premium offered after deducting any discounts (combination discounts, payroll discounts, etc.), but without surcharges for fixed premium components. The net premium includes any final fee, brokerage fee, taxes and duties. Corresponds to the premium charged to the customer.
